## MetaManager context set

Set the current context by name

### Synopsis

Persists the context name to the context file (used when MM_CONTEXT is unset). For the current shell only, use: export MM_CONTEXT=<name>.

```
MetaManager context set <name> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for set
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -d, --debug   enable debug logging
```
